Common.description: POKT RPClist is a list of decentralized RPC services supported by Pocket Network. You can use this tool to easily connect your wallets to several of Pocket's public RPC URLs across multiple chains. Pocket Network has tens of thousands of independent nodes to provide stable, fast, and decentralized RPC services with maximum uptime.
Common.help-info: Helping users connect to blockchains with Pocket Network’s decentralized RPC service.
